Entry.JapaneseText: トーマは、ジルバがこの国を 救済しようとしてるって言ってたよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma said that Zilva was trying to bring about this country's salvation, didn't he?

Entry.JapaneseText: おれたちの邪魔しようとしてるヤツが 国を救うなんて、冗談じゃねえぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Our adversaries are going to save this country? What a joke!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>思念<White>とか<Cyan>聖獣<White>のコト、 あんまりよく知らないのかも？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe they don't know much about the <Blue>Will<White> or the <Cyan>Sacred Beasts<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……知っていて敢えて、俺たちの 邪魔をしようとしている事もありうる。
Entry.EnglishText: No... It's possible that they know about that and are still deliberately getting in our way.
What do you mean by that?

Entry.JapaneseText: わからん……ジルバには、何か別の方法、 別の思惑があるのかもしれん……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure... Perhaps Zilva knows of another way, or perhaps she has a different agenda...
